title: Stewartfreude
author: VD
content_html:
I’m not a fan of Jon Stewart, but I’ll say this for him. The more the Democratic Party disintegrates under the pressure of wielding power, the more bitter and funny he becomes.

And Cramer… nice call!
content_text:
I’m not a fan of Jon Stewart, but I’ll say this for him.  The more the Democratic Party disintegrates under the pressure of wielding power,
the more bitter and funny he becomes
.
